Last day of school for Kaleb. Summer adventures await.... or rather summer adventures on the iPad. Need to get them out of the house and into nature or they become electric zombies. Or Ezombies. (©️ me)

#homeiswheretheheartis #son #family #love #nature #outdoors @marvilacar @bonetiredmama

June 4, 2019. 
Turned 40 today. It’s hard moment. Halfway point. Reassessment day. Now I realize what a midlife crisis is all about. 
But the world always throws in something you don’t expect. A nest in my backyard. Brand new life that I’ve been looking at for weeks. A new beginning. 
#nature #40thbirthday #birds #nest #robin #nest #wildlifeconservation #midlifecrisis #homeiswheretheheartis

Whale shark and a ballerina. 
Not something I usually see at the same time. 
These images are part of a larger project I’m developing dealing with habituated animals - creatures normally wild, that are used to, or influenced by human interaction. 
#onassignment #silhouette #whaleshark #aquarium #underwaterphotography #ocean #marinelife #conservation #marineconservation #ballerina #wildlifeconservation @sonyalpha @sealegacy #bealpha

Caption this.... Back from a shoot with @bonetiredmama @marvilacar and @luke_inman_photography for @sonyalpha 
#bealpha #bealphafemale #shark #greatwhiteshark #wildlifeconservation #marinelife #underwaterphotography

Sometimes you just need to dive in, go big, and throw your kids into the sea with GREAT WHITE SHARKS. Mateo and Kaleb joined @bonetiredmama @benlowy and @luke_inman_photography to shoot this video with one of nature’s most fearsome apex predator. 
No children were harmed!

Below and in the profile is the link to our blog post and the @sonyalpha edit!

https://home-work.world/2019/04/01/tips-for-photographing-great-whites/

Newark Broad Street, NJ | January 14, 2018
It’s a cold commute day. 
@marvilacar and I are headed to the city for @dinnertableconversations meetings!

#njtransit #nj #streetphotography #streetleaks
CES. Land of electronically inspired silhouettes.

The CES Walkscape 
I talked about this project during my @sonyalpha Artisan lecture in Vegas. It’s about deconstructing the over-documentation of the world around us. One image representing a multitude of time and place. 
Don’t worry I have an art degree, so this makes sense. 
#ces #walkscapes #conceptualphotography #deepthoughts

All I have. 
My whole world. 
My everything.

Walkscape on the west side 
I didn’t think if I should, 
Only if I could

Midtown 
Aimless wander
Things running things
People moving through people 
Lines and function, organic 
A confusing mass

Stacey Abrams. 
For @nymag

Johannesburg, SA | October 24, 2018
Thanks for the memories! First stills I took in weeks. Been super into a video-frame-of-mind - working with @marvilacar @bonetiredmama and our kids on our episode for @natgeowild 
Now back home!
Got to vote!!!! #homework #onassignment #dinnertableconversations #belapha @sonyalpha @sonymea @lowylacar

Johannesburg, SA | Oct 2018
Traveling with your kids for a month is HELL!!!!!
Just kidding.... sort of. 🤪 
Mateo is posing at a studio setup at Photo+ Africa where @marvilacar and I got to talk about our work apart and together. 
After weeks on the continent we are heading home tomorrow!

#homework #dinnertableconversations #son @bonetiredmama @sonymea @sonyalpha

Masai Mara, Kenya | October 14 2018
My brood. @marvilacar and I are not really sure if all this is lost on the boys. When we were 5 feet away from the lion, KK was yacking it up about The Flash and whether he’s faster than a cheetah. Mateo kept asking about the remake of the Lion King as an elephant strolled past our truck. They still get excited about a “closet built inside the walls” at our hotel (we only own IKEA)... so I’m not really sure what will really stick with these kids. Thanks to @natgeowild @safariliveofficial  @maniejohnkipas for the opportunity to bring the kids to this open air classroom in the Maasai Mara. Follow @bonetiredmama on IG for BTS of our trip and @marvilacar and @benlowy for some photos and videos from The Great Migration. #bealpha @sonyalpha

Masai Mara, Kenya | October 2018
Lessons from the field. 
So lions will mate for the whole day but the actual coitus lasts for only about 5 seconds. Then the male sleeps for around 15 minutes before trying again. This will go on for the whole day. Why is he called King of the Jungle again? @benlowy and @marvilacar  are on an expedition in Kenya for Nat Geo Wild Thanks to #safarilive for their hospitality! ©️Lowy+Lacar #natgeowild #thegreatmigration #dinnertableconversations #homework
